name: The Northern Connection
description:
The Northern Connection is an industry day ran by three of the UK's largest student radio stations. With very limited time, I was tasked with converting the event's print designs into a responsive website, while still abiding by the event's brand guidelines

The website is built using Foundation 6 and is hosted on GitHub Pages.

name: Leeds Student Radio
description: During my time as Leeds Student Radio's Head of Software, I've made significant changes to the station's online presence. I've been responsible for launching a new WordPress/Bootstrap based website, along with creating myLSR, the station's bespoke intranet and backend. I also develop smaller features when needed, such as the station's online player.

name: Empire Minecraft
description:
Currently a work in progress, this is a landing page for a gaming network with over 500,000 members and will be new player's first interaction with the network.

Designed with younger players in mind, the page makes extensive use of visuals and presents information in a very simple to understand way. For ease of updates, the page is built on WordPress, with Bootstrap being used to aid design.
